content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Attack Surface Risk Management is now Cyber Risk Exposure Management February 7, 2025— Trend Vision One™ is expanding capabilities to deliver more value. Attack Surface Risk Management is now Cyber Risk Exposure Management (CREM), emphasizing proactive risk identification, assessment, and mitigation. With current cutting-edge capabilities, CREM allows you to continuously monitor entry points, prioritize mitigation actions based on impact, and predict future threats to neutralize risks before they materialize.
